name: T - Emma Emily
_source: speak;Emily; N-No, I'm not!{w} Y-you saw that, right?
speak;Emma; I{tgm}...{tgm}I'm scared too, Emily,{w} but we need to stop them before they kill us or get to our village.
speak;Emily; Y-yeah!{w} You're right!{w} No time to worry,{w} we gotta kill them all before they can get us!
speak;Emma; Just remember to stick together.{w} I've got your back.
speak;Emily; Just worry about keeping up once I get going!
